markdownDescription: Synonym mappings to use in your index. To learn more, see [Define Synonym Mappings in Your Atlas Search Index](https://dochub.mongodb.org/core/synonym-mapping-fts).
description: Synonym mappings to use in your index.

name.markdownDescription: Label that identifies the synonym mapping. You must specify a unique value in the index definition and not an empty string.
name.description: Label that identifies the synonym mapping.

source.markdownDescription: [Source collection](https://dochub.mongodb.org/core/source-collection-fts) for synonym mappings to use in the index. This option takes the `collection` field.
source.description: Source collection for synonym mappings to use in the index.

collection.markdownDescription: Label that identifies the collection for synonym mappings to use in the index. You must specify a collection in the same database as your index. Documents in this collection must be in the format described in the [Synonyms Source Collection Documents](https://dochub.mongodb.org/core/source-collection-fts).
collection.description: Label that identifies the collection for synonym mappings to use in the index.

analyzer.markdownDescription:
Label that identifies the [analyzer](https://dochub.mongodb.org/core/analyzers-fts) to use with this synonym mapping. You can use a synonym mapping to query only fields analyzed with the same analyzer. By default, Atlas Search uses the [Standard Analyzer](https://dochub.mongodb.org/core/standard-fts). You can use any Atlas Search analyzer except the `lucene.kuromoji` and `lucene.cjk` [language analyzers](https://dochub.mongodb.org/core/language-fts) and the following [custom analyzer](https://dochub.mongodb.org/core/custom-fts) tokenizers and [token filters](https://dochub.mongodb.org/core/token-filters-fts):

- `nGram` Tokenizer
- `edgeGram Tokenizer`
- `daitchMokotoffSoundex` Token Filter
- `nGram` Token Filter
- `edgeGram` Token Filter
- `shingle` Token Filter
- `wordDelimiterGraph` Token Filter

To use synonyms with stop words, you must either index the field using the standard analyzer or add the synonym entry without the stop word. To learn more, see [synonyms options](https://dochub.mongodb.org/core/synonym-options-fts).
analyzer.description: Label that identifies the analyzer to use with this synonym mapping.
